short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Register automatically for courses, groups or exams in TISS as soon as they open.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TISS Lightning Registrator is a browser extension that takes the hassle out of TISS registrations. Automatically sign up for courses, groups, or exams as soon as they open. Start the extension before a registration begins, and experience lightning-fast registration that is often completed in less than a second.

TISS Lightning Registrator is an extension for the TISS website, the registration platform of TU Wien (Vienna University of Technology).

Firefox version found here: https://github.com/The-breakbar/TISS-Lightning-Registrator
